name: Driving License
description: You got your driving license in your home country and know how to drive a car, change the oil and tires, and other basics.

name: Swimming (Beginner)
description: You can swim.  Probably not very well, and you won't break any speed records, but, you CAN swim.

name: Swimming (Intermediate)
description: You're a strong swimmer.  You can't swim forever, but it's certainly an advantage over the average person.

name: Swimming (Expert)
description: You're an excellent swimmer.  Plus, all that swimming has left you in great shape.
